bibl.title: Cartoons for Weavers from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993
bibl.author: STAUFFER, Annemarie

bibl.note: Short account of a project to catalogue antique cartoons for weavers. The results will be published in: EADEM, Antike Wirkmustervorlagen und ihre Umsetzung (in preparation).
bibl.seg: STAUFFER Annemarie, Cartoons for Weavers from Graeco-Roman Egypt.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 223-230, 8 figg.
